TextBlock.Text: NEEM: Asterid, is our warp to the Gloaming Galaxy all clear? We mustn't keep Canna waiting any longer!
ASTERID: Negative. It pains me to say it, but a new inconvenience has arisen.
NEEM: And it pains me to hear it, respectively! Were the triple suns not enough?
ASTERID: They certainly were, Captain, but a foreign biomass (pollen, it seems) has encompassed our sensors and communication systems.
NEEM: Hypothesis: this plume of pollen must possess truly peculiar properties, having penetrated our shields!

ASTERID: I agree, but please show some restraint with your infatuation for alliteration. Regarding the topic at hand: Iâ€™ve sent Abies and Willow out to sample some of the pollen. We'll have a comprehensive analysis done soon.
NEEM: Fair enough, my fickle friend.
